Why HTML here?
Please leave all unnecessary comments away. Also delete the same one a few lines higher up where this was copied from. This is a textbook example ;-)  where a copy-paste led to a comment that is incorrect. Nobody will look at it anymore, and it will remain forever in the code. In a few years some novice developer will look at it and "correct" it from JSON to HTML... --- hopefully not.
